_sText:
Releasing Version 2 of my previous map, hopefully changing up alot of things and making it more enjoyable.

Still holds 50 people.

Made for the .:{420}:. Zombie Mod Server. IP - 8.6.8.175:27015

LIST OF CHANGES AND ADDITIONS.
-Added 4 zombie launchers.  Two for each spawn.  ONLY TWO ARE RECOMMENDED FOR HUMANS.  THE OTHER ONE ALWAYS LEADS TO DEATH.
-Redesigned the structure on the CT side cosmetically.  Took out vents and added another perch.
-Enlarged inside hideout of T structure making it alittle more possible for zombies, also added glass rooms outside of there.  Outside wall of the glass will eventually break if shot too much.
-Added breakable openings to the large rooms on the big building.
-Lowered upper blocks and platforms to be a tad easier for zombies.
-Added two more hovering platforms with teleports leading to them.  Locations of the teleports are hidden, but not too hard to figure out.
-Took out second floor wrap around.  Just wasted space.
-Added a couple more boxes to truck area.
-Doubled damage of the killing floor so zombies die faster.
-Turtles strewn about the map.  Why?  Cause I can.

PLEASE REPORT ANY BUGS. 
LIST OF KNOWN BUGS BELOW.
-For some reason the launcher that goes over the trucks on the T side launches really far, so more control is needed on that, but it's still usable.

VIDEO SHOWING THE MAP WILL BE POSTED SOON WHEN I CAN FIGURE OUT WHAT IS WRONG ADOBE PREMIERE PRO 2.
